TextEng: Let us work together to conquer the world. It should be large enough for two to share.
Text: 함께 세계를 정복하자. 둘이 나누기엔 충분히 클 거야.

TextEng: Your evil ends here and now!
I have heard enough. It is time for you to die.
Text: 이제 충분히 들었어. 네가 죽을 시간이야.

TextEng: I came to kill you, not to banter.
Text: 널 죽이러 왔지, 잡담하러 온 게 아니야.

TextEng: The mythal will destroy you. Let it go...
Text: 미살라가 널 파괴할 거야. 그냥 놔둬...

TextEng: You have lost your gaze that turns men to stone?
You are mad! Return this city to the sands where it belongs!
Text: 넌 미쳤어! 이 도시를 원래 있던 모래 속으로 돌려보내!

TextEng: What does the mythal let you see, Heurodis?
Let us work together to conquer the world. It should be large enough for two to share.
Text: 함께 세계를 정복하자. 둘이 나누기엔 충분히 클 거야.

TextEng: Your evil ends here and now!
I have heard enough. It is time for you to die.
Text: 이제 충분히 들었어. 네가 죽을 시간이야.

TextEng: I came to kill you, not to banter.
Text: 널 죽이러 왔지, 잡담하러 온 게 아니야.

TextEng: The mythal will destroy you. Let it go...
Text: 미살라가 널 파괴할 거야. 그냥 놔둬...

TextEng: You have lost your gaze that turns men to stone?
You are mad! Return this city to the sands where it belongs!
Text: 넌 미쳤어! 이 도시를 원래 있던 모래 속으로 돌려보내!

TextEng: What does the mythal let you see, Heurodis?
"Ha ha... ha...? Er, I was only kidding..."
"I don't have to answer to you! Bring it on!"
"Could you tell me where I might find a warm drink?"
"Where can I learn the Reaper's True Name?"
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"I need to return home to the world of Toril."
"That winged chap in the tavern... You know him?"
"How did he plan to wake the Sleeping Man?"
"Where can I find these Velox Berries?"
"Why do you need to start a fire?"
"I seek answers to the Five-Fold Mysteries."
"Have you got anything to chase off the cold?"
"Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"I need to return home to the world of Toril."
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"Don't worry about me. Just tell me where I can help."
Text: 걱정 마세요. 어디서 도울 수 있는지만 말해 주세요.

TextEng: "It's a long story. Is your family safe?"
"I had some unfinished business with Mephistopheles."
Text: 메피스토펠레스와 미처 끝내지 못한 일이 있었어요.

TextEng: "I've been to the Hells and back, Durnan..."
"Have you no spine? He is but a devil. Destroy him!"
Text: 기개가 없는 거예요? 놈은 그냥 마귀일 뿐이에요. 쓰러뜨려요!

TextEng: "Just keep everyone safe. I'll handle Mephistopheles."
Text: 모두를 안전하게 지켜 주세요. 메피스토펠레스는 제가 상대할게요.

TextEng: <StartAction>Use twenty Velox Berries to ignite a raging fire.</Start>
<StartAction>Use three Velox Berries to ignite a large fire.</Start>
<StartAction>Use two Velox Berries to ignite a medium fire.</Start>
<StartAction>Use one Velox Berry to ignite a small fire.</Start>
<StartAction>Light a fire with flint and tinder.</Start>
<StartAction>Put the pieces of the ring away.</Start>
<StartAction>Take the ring apart and put it away.</Start>
